sen.j: 通幻寂霊（つうげんじゃくれい、元亨2年（1322年） - 明徳2年/元中8年5月5日 (旧暦)（1391年6月7日））は、南北朝時代 (日本)の曹洞宗の僧。
sen.e: Tsugenjakurei (1322 - June 7, 1391) was a Soto sect Buddhist monk during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts.

sen.j: 豊前国国東郡武蔵郷の出身。
sen.e: He came from Musashigori, Kunisakigun, Buzen Province.

sen.j: 17歳で豊前国大光寺の定山祖禅について出家し、翌年太宰府戒壇院で受戒している。
sen.e: He took the tonsure under Jozansozen of Daikoji Temple in Buzen Province at the age of 17, and in the next year he was ordained as a Buddhist priest by receiving the commandments of Buddhism at the ordination hall of Dazaifu.

sen.j: 1340年加賀国大乗寺の明峰素哲に、1352年能登国總持寺の峨山韶碩に師事してその法を継いだ。
sen.e: In 1340, he studied under Meihosotetsu at Daijoji Temple in Kaga Province, and in 1352, he studied under Gazanjoseki at Sojiji Temple in Noto Province and inherited their teachings.

sen.j: 1368年總持寺5世となり、1370年細川頼之の庇護を受け丹波国に永沢寺を開いた。
sen.e: In 1358, he became the fifth head priest of Soji-ji Temple, and in 1370, he founded Yotakuji Temple in Tanba Province under the patronage of Yoriyuki HOSOKAWA.

sen.j: 後円融天皇の勅命により洞上の僧録となり、その後再び総持寺に住した。
sen.e: In obedience to the command of Emperor Goenyu, he became a personal manager 'Soroku' of Tosho, and later lived in Sojiji Temple again.

sen.j: 通幻の門下には通幻十哲と呼ばれる優れた禅僧を輩出した。
sen.e: From the disciples of Tsugen, outstanding Zen sect priests were produced and collectively called the ten great disciples of Tsugen.
Among the disciples of Tsugen, outstanding Zen sect priests appeared and were collectively called "Tsugen Great Ten".
sen.cmt: 「通幻十哲」の表記を用語集に沿って直しました。From→Among、were produced→appearedとしました。
sen.e: Among the disciples of Tsugen, outstanding Zen sect priests appeared and were collectively called "Tsugen Great Ten".

sen.j: 民話「子育て幽霊」の幽霊によって育てられた赤ん坊の後身が寂霊であるとする伝承がある。
sen.e: There is a legend that Jyakurei was a baby described in the folktale 'Child rearing Ghost' who was brought up by a ghost.
A legend say that Jyakurei was a baby who had been brought up by a ghost of 'Child rearing Ghost'.
sen.cmt: 「There is a legend 」→「A legend say」とし、「described in the folktale」は重複となるので削除し、「was brought up」を過去完了にしました。
